greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangles with integer sides i <= j <= k sorted by area, and, in case of ties, lexicographically by side lengths (smallest first). The sequence gives shortest side i. The other sides are in A331252 and A331253.
xref: Cf. A331252 (middle side j), A331253 (longest side k).
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, Jan 19 2020
